name: Antonio Neri
text: @PatrickMoorhead @HPE Thanks for joining us, Pat!

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thank you to all who attended our #HPEOpenHouse this week. I'm proud of the relationship we've built between the analyst community and the @HPE team, in large part because your voices are invaluable to us and our strategy. Great catching up with everyone!//t.co/YjYLpOrwrD

name: Antonio Neri
text: Enabling positive change has been a priority since the time of our founders, and sustainability is a big part of that. I'm not only thrilled by this year's recognition of @HPE by #DJSI, but even more determined to continue our efforts.//t.co/zT1wVJRGgu

name: Antonio Neri
text: The talent we have in Germany sets a high bar. I enjoyed the thoughtful questions about the @HPE vision and their role in making it successful I left seriously impressed.//t.co/4R7GSGv7OH

name: Antonio Neri
text: More #data-driven insights. More #AI-enabled outcomes. More turn-key solutions. That's what our customers can expect with our acquisition of supercomputing leader, @cray_inc. Happy to officially welcome the team to the @HPE family!//t.co/GVFfb0tl0Y

name: Antonio Neri
text: More #data-driven insights. More #AI-enabled outcomes. More turn-key solutions. That's what our customers can expect with our acquisition of supercomputing leader, @cray_inc. Happy to officially welcome the team to the @HPE family!//t.co/GVFfb0tl0Y

name: Antonio Neri
text: .@HPE is a family and it's never clearer than on our Global Day of Service, when so many of us come together to uplift our communities. Over 365 projects and more than 13,000 volunteers over 163 sites. Incredible! Super proud to be a part of this team. #WeAreHPE #HPEgives//t.co/xYbjrv8cE0

name: Antonio Neri
text: .@HPE is a family and it's never clearer than on our Global Day of Service, when so many of us come together to uplift our communities. Over 365 projects and more than 13,000 volunteers over 163 sites. Incredible! Super proud to be a part of this team. #WeAreHPE #HPEgives//t.co/xYbjrv8cE0

text: So great seeing all the faces of our Guadalajara employees last week! Our partner ecosystem, our culture, innovation all were touched upon while also having some fun! A big thanks to everyone who made this event possible. #TBT #AEMLive #WeAreHPE//t.co/LQFS2JcMgT

name: Antonio Neri
text: 18 years later. We remember. We reflect. We honor the memory of the fallen, their families, and the first responders and we commit to a future worthy of those we lost. #NeverForget #UnitedWeStand

name: Antonio Neri
text: 18 years later. We remember. We reflect. We honor the memory of the fallen, their families, and the first responders and we commit to a future worthy of those we lost. #NeverForget #UnitedWeStand

name: Antonio Neri
text: .@AntonioNeri_HPE talks with @susiegharib @FortuneMagazine this morning about leadership, culture, legacy and how @HPE is transforming itself and helping customers transform through the power of data. Don't miss the #OnLeading interviews in coming weeks! #technology #culture//t.co/laZi6tkxlv

name: Antonio Neri
text: All details here, including reconciliations of non-GAAP measures to the most comparable GAAP measures. $HPE//t.co/hXz9ppNERU

name: Antonio Neri
text: Our gross margin of 33.9% is up 340 basis points year-over-year and our non-GAAP EPS of $0.45 is up 7% from the prior-year period EPS and above the previously provided outlook of $0.40 to $0.44 per share. $HPE//t.co/Sd8sr8cYn2

name: Antonio Neri
text: We improved gross & operating margins, delivered strong non-GAAP EPS, generated a record level of YTD free cash flow & grew in key areas including HPC, HyperConverged Infrastructure, Hybrid Cloud & HPE Pointnext services orders, of which GreenLake is a key driver of growth. $HPE//t.co/vkllr7qd7O

name: Antonio Neri
text: In Q3, we continued to demonstrate disciplined execution which expanded profitability across the company. Our results reflect our momentum as we take deliberate steps to shift our portfolio to higher-value, software-defined offerings delivered as a Service. $HPE

name: Antonio Neri
text: Sad to hear that @dionweisler is stepping down as @HP's CEO, but keeping him and his family in my thoughts and prayers. I am confident he's leaving the company in good hands with my friend, @EnriqueJLores.

name: Antonio Neri
text: Our ongoing partnership with @UHouston is one that's very close to my heart and I know I am not the only one. Thrilled about their visit today and very much looking forward to the launch of the @HPE Data Science Institute at UH.//t.co/roMBWh6iNr

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thank you, @LisaSu, for an inspiring start of the week! From driving joint customer outcomes to our evolving partnership - which has already made 37 world records in database utilization - we have a lot to celebrate. Thank you for your continued partnership!//t.co/hrOu5CKfPK

name: Antonio Neri
text: Welcome to the @HPE family, @mapr!//t.co/sVKasx24eO

name: Antonio Neri
text: So thrilled to see all the amazing work displayed at our intern project fair today. Thank you for all your hard work this summer, and I hope to welcome you back next year - there is so much opportunity for all of you at @HPE.//t.co/lP4myYsAtZ

name: Antonio Neri
text: Today we grieve and stand in solidarity with the Brooklyn and Gilroy communities. These appalling acts of violence need to stop. All of us must stand strong, together, against hatred.My heart goes out to all the families affected. Deeply saddening.

name: Antonio Neri
text: Excited to see @MercedesAMGF1 take the track at the #GermanGP! Not only is this their 200th race, it also marks 125 Years of Motorsport. Hear how we've teamed up to give the speed of high performance computing a whole new meaning.//t.co/jZunQb7MrP #Motorsport125//t.co/SCOT08NNlu

name: Antonio Neri
text: Excited to see @MercedesAMGF1 take the track at the #GermanGP! Not only is this their 200th race, it also marks 125 Years of Motorsport. Hear how we've teamed up to give the speed of high performance computing a whole new meaning.//t.co/jZunQb7MrP #Motorsport125//t.co/SCOT08NNlu

name: Antonio Neri
text: India's rich diversity has made the country an invaluable contributor to the world economy. It's why @HPE has decided to invest $500 million towards driving growth for customers, partners, employees and citizens in India.//t.co/QYenaCzN1P

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thank you @narendramodi for such an inspiring meeting. Great to see we have a shared commitment to leverage tech for the greater good and to advance the way people live and work. Very much looking forward to our extended partnership in India.//t.co/DrbUn1vQAQ

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thank you for your time and hospitality, @Dev_Fadnavis and @CMOMaharashtra. Very much looking forward to growing our partnership.//t.co/hatM4VB0Mi

name: Antonio Neri
text: On #InternationalNelsonMandelaDay, let's remember that we all have the power to take action and inspire change in others. It is easy to break down and destroy. The heroes are those who make peace and build. - Nelson Mandela. #MandelaDay2019

name: Antonio Neri
text: On #InternationalNelsonMandelaDay, let's remember that we all have the power to take action and inspire change in others. It is easy to break down and destroy. The heroes are those who make peace and build. - Nelson Mandela. #MandelaDay2019

name: Antonio Neri
text: It's encouraging to see industry leaders step up and do their part in advancing social good. We have to be the improvement we want to see in the world and it's our responsibility to use our privileged position for these goals great article.//t.co/srCZgb5l2K

name: Antonio Neri
text: July 4th is an especially important holiday for me as I reflect on my journey immigrating here. My story is like those of so many others who came here for a better life and I'm incredibly proud to be an American, as well as an immigrant. Happy #4thJuly !

name: Antonio Neri
text: .@SCastellWSJ's recent article on #AI at the edge is definitely worth reading - not just because it featured our very own @englimgoh, but also because it showed the vast applications of this tech in bringing intelligence & security to a variety of industries. Some highlights:

name: Antonio Neri
text: As leaders in the tech industry, we have a powerful opportunity to bring about positive change through our innovation. Our strong #ESG performance and our annual Living Progress Report is something we are all very proud of at @HPE.//t.co/beSRZQlcN6

name: Antonio Neri
text: @Susie_Wolff @HPE_Discover @HPE @VenturiFE @venturi @FIAFormulaE Thank you for joining us, Susie!

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thank you all for making this #HPEDiscover one to remember! We've learned from each other. We've inspired each other. And had some fun in between. Speaking of fun, here are some of my favorite moments from this past week.//t.co/hj356Ac7MH

name: Antonio Neri
text: I'm reminded at #HPEDiscover of all the good that can be done with tech, like our partnership with SolarAid. Visit them in the Accelerate Productivity area and @HPE will fund a solar light for a family in Africa. Share a selfie with #AcceleratingLight and we'll fund another!//t.co/DqO0BC4aJH

name: Antonio Neri
text: I'm reminded at #HPEDiscover of all the good that can be done with tech, like our partnership with SolarAid. Visit them in the Accelerate Productivity area and @HPE will fund a solar light for a family in Africa. Share a selfie with #AcceleratingLight and we'll fund another!//t.co/DqO0BC4aJH

name: Antonio Neri
text: When innovation is driven with a higher purpose it has a better opportunity to shape the future of organizations and society overall. Thank you to all that joined and shared their purposeful innovation stories at CIO Summit this year. #HPEDiscover//t.co/Ic6otDxmWC

name: Antonio Neri
text: This year at #HPEDiscover, we're revealing one of the boldest strategic pivots we've ever committed to which will provide more choice, flexibility and scalability than ever for our customers and partners. Catch the live stream here://t.co/ePTaGJY3Cq//t.co/I9oEVmn495

name: Antonio Neri
text: I loved kicking off #HPEPartnerSummit. Our partners are a critical part of our team. Thank you for continuing to go all in on us. Looking forward to our continued success, together.//t.co/Z6USeLNIxg

name: Antonio Neri
text: Discover is my favorite event every year. The energy, the people, the technology it can't be beat! Take a sneak peek into our biggest announcements in my latest #HPEDiscover blog.//t.co/cQVqfwJi2U

name: Antonio Neri
text: At @HPE, we embrace diversity, encourage inclusion, and strive to ensure everyone feels comfortable bringing their authentic selves to work every day. I'm proud to support #PrideMonth //t.co/3PCK5654bO

name: Antonio Neri
text: Best of luck to the @MercedesAMGF1 team today as they compete in the #CanadianGP #F1. We've achieved new performance levels over the past year and can't wait to see the race today!//t.co/zDL1p6Hpyw

name: Antonio Neri
text: Best of luck to the @MercedesAMGF1 team today as they compete in the #CanadianGP #F1. We've achieved new performance levels over the past year and can't wait to see the race today!//t.co/zDL1p6Hpyw

name: Antonio Neri
text: It's everyone's responsibility to fight climate change, and I'm proud to say that @HPE is the first IT company to set emissions targets across our value chain that align with climate science. #WorldEnvironmentDay//t.co/1SKLAMD2GW

name: Antonio Neri
text: Immigration adds value to our society, our communities, and our business. @HPE is proud to support #DreamAndPromiseNow #HR6.//t.co/nqm8M8fegg

name: Antonio Neri
text: Immigration adds value to our society, our communities, and our business. @HPE is proud to support #DreamAndPromiseNow #HR6.//t.co/nqm8M8fegg

name: Antonio Neri
text: Great day in London at the awesome new @SpursOfficial stadium. What better place to have our all employee meeting than at a stadium powered by @HPE technology? Thank you to the Spurs and Sanjeev Katwa for hosting us!//t.co/F56JI0NRXA

name: Antonio Neri
text: @PhilDavis_HPE @HPE @SpursOfficial Welcome to @Twitter, @PhilDavis_HPE!

name: Antonio Neri
text: Even without the final victory, @SpursOfficial are the champions for us. Thank you for your commitment, dedication and hard work throughout the season - beyond proud to be your partner.//t.co/LX5E9Qv44D

name: Antonio Neri
text: At @HPE, we're global citizens first and foremost. This week we've launched our newest social impact campaign, HPE Accelerating Impact, with @FfwdOrg. I hope all of my colleagues join me in donating and accelerating these nonprofits' impact. #HPEproud//t.co/mX3OkbJ9Rx

name: Antonio Neri
text: Congratulations to Hon. PM @narendramodi on his re-election. At @HPE, we look forward to continuing our collaboration on path-breaking initiatives like @SmartCities_HUA, @makeinindia and @_DigitalIndia and strive to achieve the vision of transforming the way India works & grows.

name: Antonio Neri
text: All details here://t.co/yPmdQ9kPYO $HPE

name: Antonio Neri
text: I am excited about our future as we continue to deliver what our customers need most, and I remain confident that our execution against this strategy will drive profitable growth and solid free cash flow, generating strong shareholder returns. $HPE

name: Antonio Neri
text: We delivered revenue of $7.2 billion dollars with growth in key businesses including storage, high performance compute, composable cloud, Aruba services and GreenLake orders. $HPE

name: Antonio Neri
text: Our Q2 performance reflects our continued progress on shifting our portfolio to higher margin products and services and we delivered strong margin improvement, expanded non-GAAP EPS and grew cash flow versus the prior year. $HPE

name: Antonio Neri
text: Deeply saddened to learn about Niki Lauda's passing.A three-time @F1 champion. An innovative business man. A true legend. An inspiration to us all.//t.co/oruQTJRsCP

name: Antonio Neri
text: A leader in supercomputing, @Cray_Inc shares our commitment to innovation and will be an important asset in accelerating our High Performance Compute opportunities. I look forward to welcoming them to the @HPE team.//t.co/4pFy6ppNhD

name: Antonio Neri
text: As citizens of this world, we all have a vital responsibility to protect our environment for now and for future generations. It was an honor to attend #VivaTech this year and represent my @HPE colleagues to discuss the role we can all play.//t.co/gje6el9yw2

name: Antonio Neri
text: Congratulations, @venturiFE team - @MassaFelipe19 and @susie_wolff - on your race today. Very cool to see the @HPE technology in action and very proud to see you on the podium today!//t.co/KxVmOJpHFU

name: Antonio Neri
text: What a game! There's no two teams more hardworking or deserving of this recognition and I'm proud of both for making it this far. Congrats to @SpursOfficial on your hard-earned win and advancement to the finals!//t.co/ysMO8PnPMA

name: Antonio Neri
text: What a fun day celebrating our employees and new headquarters! Thank you to all who attended, especially the Mayor of San Jose, @sliccardo and to the amazing @HPE team for pulling this all off! #WeAreHPE #NewHPEHQ//t.co/lbkiecejtn

name: Antonio Neri
text: What a fun day celebrating our employees and new headquarters! Thank you to all who attended, especially the Mayor of San Jose, @sliccardo and to the amazing @HPE team for pulling this all off! #WeAreHPE #NewHPEHQ//t.co/lbkiecejtn

name: Antonio Neri
text: @SanJoseD4 @sliccardo @HPE Thank you for joining us today - we're happy to be here!

name: Antonio Neri
text: My legacy at @HPE will be defined by the culture I leave behind. I want to enable our team to achieve their dreams, which is why we're celebrating the official opening of our new headquarters with new and enhanced benefits. #WeAreHPE #NewHPEHQ//t.co/0Snlo9fj3n

name: Antonio Neri
text: My legacy at @HPE will be defined by the culture I leave behind. I want to enable our team to achieve their dreams, which is why we're celebrating the official opening of our new headquarters with new and enhanced benefits. #WeAreHPE #NewHPEHQ//t.co/0Snlo9fj3n

name: Antonio Neri
text: Happy #AdminProfessionalsDay to our behind-the-scenes superheroes that make things happen every day. Thank you for your tireless work, care and dedication. You are the heartbeat of our organization.//t.co/3APDjr2Aef

name: Antonio Neri
text: @Uli_Spiesshofer @ABB_CEO Good luck with your next chapter, Uli. It's been a pleasure to partner with you on the digital journey you've taken @ABBRobotics on. Hope our paths will cross again soon.

name: Antonio Neri
text: Congrats on your wins @SpursOfficial and @AFCAjax! So cool to have two teams powered by @HPE in the semifinals. For us, you are both champions!//t.co/C1bouBREwu

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thanks @BlueData for hosting me at your headquarters today -- I'm excited to see how your big #data and #AI expertise will help innovate @HPE solutions for our increasing data needs, further and faster.//t.co/rR6hAhVRRZ

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thanks @BlueData for hosting me at your headquarters today -- I'm excited to see how your big #data and #AI expertise will help innovate @HPE solutions for our increasing data needs, further and faster.//t.co/rR6hAhVRRZ

name: Antonio Neri
text: The hybrid cloud journey tends to be a complex one. But, at @HPE, we aim to simplify it by partnering with two powerful industry players - @nutanix and @googlecloud - providing customers with more options, no matter which path they choose.//t.co/DqQ3uE5LQ3

name: Antonio Neri
text: The ambition from Tottenham Hotspur could not have been greater. Excited to be unveiling this stadium after countless hours of work from @HPE innovators. The @SpursOfficial will now have an even more unforgettable game experience. I can't wait to visit!//t.co/njuYKFPQT2

name: Antonio Neri
text: It is the culture I'm going to leave behind. And for me, it's a culture of inclusiveness. Powerful words from @AntonioNeri_HPE. Subscribers of @svbizjournal will enjoy this article honoring @HPE & Antonio for fostering diversity in tech.//t.co/ElFPSGPRbP

name: Antonio Neri
text: #HPEDiscoverMore in Dubai exceeded all of my expectations! I'm leaving inspired after meeting state representatives, regional industry leaders and the tireless team who made everything possible.//t.co/KKDpJTkyGM

name: Antonio Neri
text: Great meeting you, @SarahAmiri1! Thank you for your trust - excited to partner with you on advancing innovation in the UAE.//t.co/zICOBcXBAd

name: Antonio Neri
text: Congrats, @ArchieDeskus! Super proud of you!//t.co/nN8gNotyuP

name: Antonio Neri
text: I am deeply saddened and strongly condemn the Christchurch, New Zealand, terrorist attack on mosques. Our hearts at @HPE are with the victims and their families. We grieve with you.

name: Antonio Neri
text: Powerful blog from @ArchieDeskus. Diversity & inclusion isn't just a talking point for me or for anyone @HPE - it's a goal we're actively fighting for. As male allies, me must do better when it comes to building a more inclusive workplace.//t.co/z9WSD7tyBb #IWD2019

name: Antonio Neri
text: We started the year off strong - fueled by the right strategy and disciplined performance. Thank you to all our employees for your hard work, dedication, and passion and to our customers and partners for your trust we're just getting started.//t.co/oM56bglWQ5

name: Antonio Neri
text: @matteastwood Thanks, Matt! Looking forward to hosting you at our new office.

name: Antonio Neri
text: Today we officially opened the doors to our new San Jose HQ , a project I've been personally involved with to ensure our new home has the right environment for success, flexibility & fun. I can't decide what's my favorite part, the view, the work spaces, the putting green...//t.co/4ryMPQIMi5

name: Antonio Neri
text: To mark my one-year anniversary as @HPE's CEO, I reflected on some of the top highlights from this past year and on our vision for the future://t.co/0Raz4KMZnM

name: Antonio Neri
text: I am grateful and inspired to live in a time of such acceleration and potential, and to work in a company where we can drive collaboration, leading advancements and using technology to help solve some of the world's biggest challenges.

name: Antonio Neri
text: Making @HPE a place where people are proud to work is a top priority. Last year, we made noticeable progress in transforming the employee experience, fostering active resource groups and investing in new training and professional development opportunities.

name: Antonio Neri
text: When it comes to innovation, I'm particularly excited for the edge. We see it as the next frontier, so much so that we made a commitment to invest heavily in that area and we are making key acquisitions and developing strategic partnerships.

name: Antonio Neri
text: Since my time in the call center, my passion for tech will forever be linked to my passion for customers. I know that through listening to customer's needs, technological advancements can have a real impact on people's lives.

name: Antonio Neri
text: As I begin my 2nd year as @HPE's CEO, I find I am still in line with my younger self still striving to give my all to a company I strongly believe in. Three priorities during my first year have been particularly top-of-mind: customers and partners, innovation, and culture.

name: Antonio Neri
text: It's hard to find the words to express how deeply saddened I am by this morning's news of Pierre Nanterme's passing. Pierre was an exceptionally visionary leader & a passionate equality advocate, with an innate drive for growth and a contagious energy. He will be sorely missed.

name: Antonio Neri
text: Innovation does not belong to the few, but must be shared to ensure we all prosper. Thank you to @nichcarlson and my fellow panelists for having me, and letting me share my opinions on how to improve the future with enhanced computing capabilities. #wef19//t.co/GzhPg6Qgmx

name: Antonio Neri
text: The diverse, inspiring leaders here at #wef19 are a perfect example of what we need most to overcome the challenges our society faces openness & collaboration. Tomorrow, I'll be discussing two important challenges these alliances can help overcome.//t.co/h57uOqaq70

name: Antonio Neri
text: The promise of computing is nothing new. However, in the face of current societal challenges, we must push the limits of what technology can do. Ahead of #wef19, I share my thoughts on what needs to change.//t.co/FXHmVyDrFH

name: Antonio Neri
text: Congratulations, @Craw well deserved!//t.co/oZlmrcZ1xg

name: Antonio Neri
text: Ho Ho Ho! Santa here, reporting live from today's all employee meeting. What a terrific year for our @HPE team thank you for all your hard work and wishing you the happiest of holidays!//t.co/npD5dLYl8Q

name: Antonio Neri
text: Board Chairman Pat Russo is a perfect example of what it means to be a #FearlessWomen, so I was thrilled to see her profiled by the @NYSE. Thank you for the kind words and dedication to @HPE's vision of creative innovation through communication.//t.co/860Jaopdmt

name: Antonio Neri
text: After #HPEDiscover, I've had the honor to join Prince Albert at @palaismonaco for @VenturiFE's (re)launch event. Today, I am thrilled to share that we are partnering with the #FormulaE team to supply the cutting-edge tech they need to get ahead.//t.co/LppGI4Nl1x//t.co/YJLXgYrElc

name: Antonio Neri
text: After #HPEDiscover, I've had the honor to join Prince Albert at @palaismonaco for @VenturiFE's (re)launch event. Today, I am thrilled to share that we are partnering with the #FormulaE team to supply the cutting-edge tech they need to get ahead.//t.co/LppGI4Nl1x//t.co/YJLXgYrElc

name: Antonio Neri
text: What a great way to close my 1st fiscal year as CEO! Our Q4 results conclude a year marked by significant transformation and achievement. Thank you to the teams behind this success. I have great confidence in our vision and what's to come in 2019. $HPE//t.co/zzJe5286Ar

name: Antonio Neri
text: I had a great time with @LewisHamilton and Toto Wolff today. It's been a rewarding and adrenaline-filled experience for @HPE to work alongside @MercedesAMGF1, both in the factory and on the track, helping to drive the team to the winner's circle. #HPEDiscover.//t.co/G2Qf09h1aF

name: Antonio Neri
text: What an inspiring #WomenInTech panel at #HPEDiscover! And also a reminder that there's still work to be done. At @HPE we're proud to support diversity at all levels and to have five brilliant, tech-minded women on our Board of Directors leading the way.//t.co/x0BiIhZVT3

name: Antonio Neri
text: What an inspiring #WomenInTech panel at #HPEDiscover! And also a reminder that there's still work to be done. At @HPE we're proud to support diversity at all levels and to have five brilliant, tech-minded women on our Board of Directors leading the way.//t.co/x0BiIhZVT3

name: Antonio Neri
text: @heyemilykennedy @EngLimGoh @HPE @HPE_Discover Thank you for joining us, @heyemilykennedy! You're an inspiration to all of us.

name: Antonio Neri
text: Hola from Madrid! Watch live as @LewisHamilton and Toto take the stage to talk tech with @AntonioNeri_HPE of @HPE at #HPEDiscover LIVE NOW //t.co/nN4Vc7l1Nf//t.co/q4c75vewbz

name: Antonio Neri
text: Time is often the most valuable resource in the medical community. I'm excited to share that, together, @HPE and @junglainc are aiming to transform the world of medicine as we know it by reducing precious research time from years to weeks.//t.co/PssX7Dbdw4 #HPEDiscover

name: Antonio Neri
text: During our general session at #HPEDiscover in Madrid, I will focus on our vision for the enterprise of the future and why it should matter to you. If you're not with us in Madrid, you can still join us, virtually://t.co/ePTaGJY3Cq//t.co/mA4kE6dn65

name: Antonio Neri
text: To deliver an experience that is open to any cloud integrations, we're introducing the industry's first open hybrid cloud platform built on composability. So you can forget the challenges of a hybrid environment & focus solely on innovation. #HPEDiscover//t.co/1dTjrPHnT3

name: Antonio Neri
text: Our strategy is to accelerate your enterprise from edge to cloud, helping you connect your data, your edges, your clouds - all of it. So you can focus solely on innovation. Here's what you should be excited about in Madrid next week at #HPEDiscover://t.co/0MwPqAP4Zg

name: Antonio Neri
text: Proud of the performance of our Spaceborne computer on the @Space_Station and excited by our news that it will now extend above the clouds.//t.co/krRKpkgUlh

name: Antonio Neri
text: The sports industry is often quick to embrace tech, and the @warriors are no exception. I'm excited about our new partnership with the team and @chasecenter - it's not just about improving performance but building a new kind of fan experience, at the Edge.//t.co/gbg8fQL6He//t.co/gxNupGnUyz

name: Antonio Neri
text: Who doesn't enjoy a good scare (and laugh) from time to time? Such a fun Halloween celebration today @HPE!//t.co/4f00y9ZQsw

name: Antonio Neri
text: What an exciting start to the morning! It was an honor ringing the opening bell at the @NYSE ahead of our @HPE Securities Analyst Meeting today.//t.co/35dPs7aE5Y

name: Antonio Neri
text: I had a great time at the #F1 Grand Prix in Austin today supporting @MercedesAMGF1 and discussing how @HPE is redefining efficiency for them. I look forward to continuing our collaboration in the factory and on the track.//t.co/8HHSfuARkG

name: Antonio Neri
text: @Schaefer_Tom @HPE_FS @irvrothman @TarekRobbiati Thanks for the warm welcome - looking forward to be back soon!

name: Antonio Neri
text: @Valeriecapodic2 On my way! See you soon, Valerie!

text: @CarolineHydeTV @HPE Thank you, @CarolineHydeTV! I had a great time.

name: Antonio Neri
text: I enjoyed speaking with @CarolineHydeTV at the @BloombergSBS this morning, discussing something I'm so proud and passionate about: @HPE's commitment to a sustainable future through innovation and technology.//t.co/e46SBp9X33

name: Antonio Neri
text: I always look forward to meeting the up-and-coming innovators evolving our industry and I had the pleasure of speaking with some of them tonight. Thanks to @rstor_io, @WekaIO, @portwx, @AgileStacks and @YellowbrickData for coming out to our Pathfinder event.//t.co/enTgUMJCnh

name: Antonio Neri
text: Congratulations to @HPE board member, Pamela Lynn Carter, who received the Sandra Day O'Connor Board Excellence Award today! Thank you for your dedication to propelling our business forward.//t.co/ZGhPJGhKG7

name: Antonio Neri
text: @rfaletra @TheChannelCo @StevenJBurke Thanks again for providing a great forum for discussion and for sharing the stage with me. I had a great time!

name: Antonio Neri
text: Partners are an extension of our team and often have unique insight into the challenges our customers face. Thank you to @TheChannelCo for letting me share how we're building solutions that allow us to grow together. #BOB18//t.co/tPDn0gQttd

name: Antonio Neri
text: October is here, and that means it's Oktoberfest at our Roseville campus! Enjoyed spending time with my colleagues here today for an all-employee meeting.//t.co/Y0j9teokml

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thank you to @SquawkCNBC and Maggie Wilderotter for hosting me this morning. I had a great time discussing my vision for growth and future innovation at @HPE, specifically as it relates to a future where more and more data is and must be at the edge.//t.co/jmg7AsoDtD

name: Antonio Neri
text: What if we could take the work we're doing today and drive it forward toward a larger goal? With our new #TechImpact2030 program, and the involvement of leaders across industry, academia and government, we're sure going to try. #wefimpact//t.co/7pyOrIhfd2

name: Antonio Neri
text: What if we could take the work we're doing today and drive it forward toward a larger goal? With our new #TechImpact2030 program, and the involvement of leaders across industry, academia and government, we're sure going to try. #wefimpact//t.co/7pyOrIhfd2

name: Antonio Neri
text: What an honor to host and meet the @NACME Board of Directors today. I am inspired by your mission in #STEM education and career development and we, at @HPE, stand by your goal to achieve a diverse and dynamic workforce.//t.co/bd6zzz09gS

name: Antonio Neri
text: Working towards a better, more sustainable future is something that's been a part of our DNA since the days of our founders, and is not something that's going away anytime soon. Thank you to the @DowJones for recognizing our commitment://t.co/EP75KZuuYH #DJSI

name: Antonio Neri
text: Innovation is at the core of our culture, and it was great to see this come to life during my visit with employees at our Ft. Collins and Houston campuses this week. Thanks for your hospitality - already looking forward to be back soon!//t.co/gqyeHbiHe1

name: Antonio Neri
text: Q3 results are out and I am very pleased with the solid results we delivered. Some of my key takeaways from the report://t.co/DtfOuHEWmx

name: Antonio Neri
text: We're almost at the one-year mark for our joint project with @NASA, the Spaceborne Computer, and I'm excited to move one step closer to HPC at the extreme edge. Thank you @MdotFernandez & team for reaching for the stars!//t.co/rZ99HkXt03

name: Antonio Neri
text: Honored to have received the 2018 ISS Innovation Award for Technology Development and Demonstration. Special thank you to @NASA for your partnership and to @MdotFernandez and team for all of the hard work on the project! #ISSRDC//t.co/5mZd1b1VH4

name: Antonio Neri
text: It's always inspiring meeting with start-ups at our Pathfinder Happy Hours. I leave with a refreshed sense of optimism about where technology is headed and reminded of why I do what I do. A special thank you to everyone who makes this program possible.//t.co/FbiVRvwEC7

name: Antonio Neri
text: As a global tech leader, we're committed to adopting cybersecurity best practices as part of our strategy. Join me and other tech leaders this Friday as we discuss the future of security at @WashingtonPost's Cyber #202Live event.//t.co/UbhguMrENE

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thank you @Reuters for naming @HPE as one of the Thomson Reuters 2018 Top 100 Global Technology Leaders and for recognizing what I see from my colleagues every day amazing leadership and a drive to propel the tech industry forward. Photo credit: Agency Moanalani Jeffrey//t.co/IkrnbvTYSg

name: Antonio Neri
text: This is one of the most exciting time in history tech is playing a key role in pushing the boundaries of what is possible. On July 9th, I'll be sitting down with @Reuters to talk about @HPE's future and the tech that will get us there.//t.co/9nlJ8w2zVK//t.co/OeZP5QMZG9

name: Antonio Neri
text: Our commitment to sustainability is increasingly important as we continue to lead innovation and create sustainable solutions for our customers and the world. I'm proud to share a few highlights from our new @HPE_LivingProg Report.//t.co/zlBg1vWd92

name: Antonio Neri
text: Great meeting up with our Storage Priority Program attendees at #HPEDiscover to talk about what the future of enterprise storage holdspredictive, cloud-ready and timeless.//t.co/sJRN9WcKSL

name: Antonio Neri
text: Your data is everything to your business. To help you make the most of this information and turn it into intelligent insights that drive business value, we're committing $4 billion to expand our leadership in the intelligent edge space.//t.co/hMkoVJ3uLl

name: Antonio Neri
text: Honored to be hosting my first Discover as CEOduring the general session today we'll cover everything you need to know about the next step beyond digital transformation and the investments we are making to help customers get there. Tune in at 2pm PT://t.co/ePTaGJGsdQ//t.co/tg43wIs8La

name: Antonio Neri
text: Can the same tech we use to make enterprises more efficient, create a better world? We think so. It's one of the reasons we partnered with @TheAtlantic to pinpoint specific industries where tech can have the biggest impact. Mark Potter explores how.//t.co/PTiR09rbZi

name: Antonio Neri
text: Unlocking the potential of unused data can lead to unprecedented societal benefits. To explore which industries could reap the reward of tech innovation, @HPE teamed up with @TheAtlantic. Watch live at 5:30pm PT to see what we discovered.//t.co/yxrpjMddRk

name: Antonio Neri
text: The enterprise of the future will be edge-centric, cloud-enabled and data-driven. But how do we get from here to there? Get a sneak peek at what we have planned for #HPEDiscover, and how we are helping customers harness a growing ocean of data.//t.co/dSd4tCmb1P

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thrilled to announce we're joining forces with @MercedesAMGF1! Their relentless commitment to performance fueled by our best-in-class technology will accelerate innovation and help them cross the finish line of their ultimate goal: to win.//t.co/urGDLi5H6u

name: Antonio Neri
text: With the World Cup set to begin later this week, it's an ideal time to reflect on the new technologies that are changing the beautiful game' on and off the field.//t.co/CkGHhhW2Cj

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thank you @MercedesAMGF1 for welcoming us in Montreal! It's clear we share the same passion for speed, performance and continuous improvement and that's why I am thrilled about the upcoming news more to come soon!//t.co/Qxx0ESIAFS

name: Antonio Neri
text: Wrapped up a successful week of meetings with colleagues, customers and partners across Europe. Next stop: Montreal.//t.co/taKnzoeNgb

name: Antonio Neri
text: Q2 results are out and I am pleased to report another strong quarter. Here are some of my key takeaways from the report://t.co/OUvSFzL5e1

name: Antonio Neri
text: I don't find many things as inspiring as the discussions we had today at the @wwt_inc. Creating technology solutions that address real problems is not possible without these insights. Thank you for your partnership!//t.co/NnnqzaRiC5

name: Antonio Neri
text: The future is hard to predict, but with the best and brightest from our community of partners and employees we are sure to be prepared. Thanks to everyone who attended this afternoon's #HPEASPIRE event!//t.co/Nib9qBs7QA

name: Antonio Neri
text: Speed and simplicity are crucial in today's hybrid world. That's why I look forward to welcoming @PlexxiInc to the @HPE team!//t.co/pDAmUr3Q8o

name: Antonio Neri
text: It's always great to be back in Houston, but this visit was even more special because I spent it with some of the brightest students from @UHouston. I am convinced I will soon see some of them leading our industry and they will do a phenomenal job! #GoCoogs//t.co/CXqy7Kkq5h

name: Antonio Neri
text: Had a great time last night hearing new ideas from a few startups as part of our Pathfinder program. Looking back, it's hard to believe how much work we used to do manually and how slow things were. Looking forward, brace yourself because the future really belongs to the fast.//t.co/sGaWMUY0ff

name: Antonio Neri
text: I can honestly say that we have some of the best partners across the globe. I had a wonderful time catching up on our upcoming priorities, as well as hearing about what you all face in the field. Looking forward to our continued collaboration!//t.co/TMBM1DkMpw

name: Antonio Neri
text: Ensuring that our company is transparent, trustworthy and doing right by the world is of upmost importance to me. Thank you, @Forbes, for recognizing this commitment and awarding @HPE a spot on your list of the 100 Most Reputable Companies.//t.co/zygrVhPLQH

name: Antonio Neri
text: I love when people from all over the @HPE ecosystem come together, like this week when we're hosting our Swiss executive tour. Thanks to all our partners and customers who came out and inspired us all.//t.co/6zr0wNcuyH

name: Antonio Neri
text: Welcome to the family, @RedPixie!//t.co/jCGONk3uH2

name: Antonio Neri
text: As we continue to build an autonomous future for our customers, #AI is an essential part of that vision. That's why I'm so excited to welcome @capenetworks to the @HPE and @ArubaNetworks team.//t.co/jNUlwtZ0yZ

name: Antonio Neri
text: Close to 4000 brilliant @HPE employees in one place! Thank you, team India! Meeting you all was definitely a highlight for me I left energized and inspired!//t.co/MMfAXADJBD

name: Antonio Neri
text: When the promise of a technology is this great, it deserves our time, attention and resources. For #AI, that means finding ways to implement it efficiently so its benefits are experienced by generations to come. //t.co/TYr46KidLf

name: Antonio Neri
text: The loss of Stephen Hawking is a challenge to us all to continue pushing boundaries & reaching for the stars. For @HPE, the work that began w/ Stephen & his COSMOS group will continue to be a humbling example of how tech can help answer the universe's most profound questions.//t.co/tNEH4vjFRx

name: Antonio Neri
text: In search of the next big thing? You're not alone. At today's #WSJCIO meeting, I discussed the data explosion driven by #TheEdge & what it means for the future of tech.//t.co/BBZa5A8d2u

name: Antonio Neri
text: In search of the next big thing? You're not alone. At today's #WSJCIO meeting, I discussed the data explosion driven by #TheEdge & what it means for the future of tech.//t.co/BBZa5A8d2u

name: Antonio Neri
text: @SCastellWSJ @HPE Thanks for having me, @SCastellWSJ! I thoroughly enjoyed our conversation.

name: Antonio Neri
text: After exchanging ideas with customers and other industry leaders in Barcelona over the past week, I truly believe #MWC18 showcased how the foundation of today's world is creating a more promising future. //t.co/NKBH9wEdxS//t.co/2FLKDIU7qj

name: Antonio Neri
text: My thoughts on @IDC's server market share results://t.co/MFA2B8nVHt

name: Antonio Neri
text: Getting ready to kick off #MWC18! Excited to meet with customers and exchange ideas with other industry leaders!//t.co/OFrh7lixJW

name: Antonio Neri
text: As we venture farther out into our solar system, how can we prepare for new obstacles and solve problems as they arise? Six months into its mission at the @Space_Station, the @HPE Spaceborne Computer is finding answers.//t.co/1A3B8fhHTW

name: Antonio Neri
text: Our first quarterly earnings are out, and we delivered strong business performance, announced innovative new solutions and won new customers. Here are a few takeaways that go beyond the numbers://t.co/897MTJqugE

name: Antonio Neri
text: Using @HPE supercomputers to help design helicopters for the @DeptofDefense? Sign us up! Thank you @JonathanVanian for the great piece on our exciting new partnership!//t.co/RNYJD9iSJB

name: Antonio Neri
text: When sport meets tech, great things happen. For @SpursOfficial, that means connectivity across a new venue thanks to @ArubaNetworks solutions with support from @HPE Pointnext. The stadium will be one of the most technologically advanced ever and will be in a league of its own.//t.co/rytzLNo9XJ

name: Antonio Neri
text: Proud to announce that we launched our IoT Innovation Lab in Singapore. As one of four Labs around the worldthe first in the regionthe Lab is just one of the ways in which @HPE is pushing the boundaries of IoT technologies to remain at the forefront of the Intelligent Edge.//t.co/c5fbizU4c1

name: Antonio Neri
text: Congrats to the Eagles on their incredible season! #superbowl2018

name: Antonio Neri
text: #HPE has been a driving force in my lifefrom starting my career to meeting my wife to now starting my first day as CEO. I have big shoes to fill, but I am beyond committed and excited about what's ahead://t.co/4jyrORkYot//t.co/D4wB6nKY4r

name: Antonio Neri
text: It was a pleasure to meet King Felipe VI to discuss new tech and our Customer Tech Center in Las Rozas. Excited about our future!//t.co/yeHezhR6qE

name: Antonio Neri
text: #LeMans racing star @MPHanratty visits #HPEDiscover to show off his car and discuss the future of fan interaction at intelligent venues. Watch here://t.co/buHNb3UlIE

name: Antonio Neri
text: #LeMans racing star @MPHanratty visits #HPEDiscover to show off his car and discuss the future of fan interaction at intelligent venues. Watch here://t.co/buHNb3UlIE

name: Antonio Neri
text: To help customers move toward a self-managing IT model, we've incorporated #AI into @HPE Infosight. Learn more about how we're paving the way for the autonomous data center://t.co/5CviShyz2Z

name: Antonio Neri
text: Thank you, Ulrich! This is one of the most amazing announcements at #HPEDiscover and I am beyond excited to see the customer applications!//t.co/35MbndJs7i

name: Antonio Neri
text: With no special hardware to buy and a unified experience, HPE OneSphere enables you to immediately and effortlessly build clouds, deploy applications, and gain insights faster across your clouds. Welcome to the Hybrid IT world!//t.co/s8gh0g0U30

name: Antonio Neri
text: Our #HPEDiscover General Session starts in five minutes. Tune in to watch @AntonioNeri_HPE, myself and other executives share exciting news about new products and partnerships we're announcing this week://t.co/cWMHkKtIQ0

name: Antonio Neri
text: We're in the midst of a data-fueled revolution, where businesses that can capture, analyze and turn data into value-driving innovations will come out on top. Get a first look at the services and partnerships we're announcing at #HPEDiscover to help://t.co/Ie008qDMg9
